channel.title: Elevator malfunction at the end of bm_c3a2a [Fixed]
channel.description:
In the Forget About Season chapter, at the end of the map bm_c3a2a (so after the firefight with the assassins) there is an issue with the elevator.
After I push it's button, it starts descending as it should. [b]However[/b] if I don't stand on the elevator when the next map (bm_c3a2b) is loaded, the elevator will go up and not down. This bug is always triggered when I am either in mid air, because I jump right before the map load, or I just stand on it's edge on a metal corridor.
...and since the button can not be used again, this bug effectively traps the player on the top.
[img]https://cloud-2.steampowered.com/ugc/578967822693638243/97F1AAE751436C890243223D68137C9C811CC263/[/img]

item.title: Elevator malfunction at the end of bm_c3a2a [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: Medkit
item.description:
EduardoSVK:

But you still can go back a bit to load previous level and then use elevator again, right? Or is that button still not working?

But yes, this should be fixed

Not really. The top of the elevator is also part of the new map, there is nothing beyond it. Where the corridor was in the previous map, there is just a wall there.

Still, quick save / load is your best friend.
